title: How to Present the Value of Telematics to Customers

tasks.task: Agricultural salesperson explaining telematics benefits to farmers.
subtasks: Introduce name and role (Darren Kennelly, precision farming specialist at Berkey's Farm Store).
Discuss telematics interest in large operations and fleet management.
Highlight reduced downtime during off-season as a key value point.
Mention off-site diagnostics as a selling point for reduced service time.
